I CANT recommend this game enough! It is one of the most addictive, interesting, and most importantly unique games I have played in a LONG time! It's the same way I felt the first time I played FLT, another of these "Indie plus" type of games that I crave over the likes of games like Far Cry 3 and DMC. GET THIS NOW SOMEHOW ANYHOW but start here with thenoobish's upload. Though I can't remember if I got it from him, any other time I used on of hus ups, I was satisfied. Props noobish!

Hello I've been having a problem with the game and it crashing.  Every time I get to a combat situation and I will get the the load screen then when it sounds like it's about to play it crashes.  I recently burned our my power supply on my nice computer and now I am on a cheap laptop for the time.  The game on low quality seems to run fine without FPS issues .  The download seems to be great besides that , please respond if you got a solution or idea to help. Also if you are getting the same problem. Thankyou!
Not sure if it is this laptop or the actual download , but i'm suprised if its the download due to all the great responses and the issue I have you cant play the game right without.

BORING AS HELL. I have finished the "Campain" in 5h and it is as complicated as farmorama or some other shit like that. I have seen broswerer games with more economic depth than this. And the combat is broken to all hell. You get frequent misses with a 89% chance to hit and frequent hits with a 12 or 17% chance to hit the % are busted or just are there for show. Also the endless game is 2h max you by then have bought everything out and are just there amassing cash since it has no opponents and no goal it is just boring.
Also this is not a Indie game as someone said its made by kalypso and seeing how you jizz all over this game they are propobly older than you are.

Hey guys I just wanted to ask if any of you know the fix for the crash before the combat mode. It works just fine during the strategic phase of the game then when I go to combat it crashes right after it loads. I barely hear the music then it immediately crash. Anyone know how to fix this?
Works just fine, but it's soooooooo boring.
